Retro Snaker





Red food: poisonous food, the snake will die if it eat the food.

Green food: this kind of food has 5 points, and will add one unit to the length of snake.

Purple food: this kind of food has 15 points, and will add three unit to the length of snake.

After eating 4 items, you will go into a higher level with a higher speed

The point you get after eating one food is: the point of the food * level

Player can control the game using mouse or keyboard.

Score: the food you eat; Point: the metrix you get.


START
